mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, a.type, a.pname, a.ptime from msg a join msg_state b on a.id = b.mid where b.uid = #{uid} order by a.id desc

select id, title, content, type, pname, ptime from msg where status = 1 and ptime >= #{ctime} and (broadcast = 1 or broadcast = 0 and find_in_set(recipient, #{uid})) and id not in (select mid from msg_state where uid = #{uid}) order by id desc
